strategy: Eldar Titan Force armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: Titans and Knights have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on Eldar Titans and Eldar Knights.

formations.name: 0-1 Wraithgate
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Eldar player's half of the table with a Wraithgate, this counts as an objective marker and a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way.

sections.name: Eldar Titans
sections.description: Choose one Titan for the army. Max 1 for each 3k points

formations.name: Phantom Titan
formations.units: One Yme-Loc Phantom Titan, Fir Iolarion Phantom Titan, Kinshara Phantom Titan or Mymeara Phantom Titan

sections.name: Eldar Scout Titans
sections.description: Up to one pair of Eldar Scout Titans for each 1000 points.

sections.name: Eldar Titans Support
sections.description: Up to three Supports formations for each Pair of Scout Titans Taken.

formations.name: Engine of Vaul Troupe
formations.units: One Engine of Vaul chosen from the following: Cobra, Scorpion, Storm Serpent
upgrades: Add one or two additional Engine of Vauls for 200 points each chosen from the following: Cobra, Scorpion, Storm Serpent

formations.name: Spirit Troupe
upgrades: Add up to four Wraithblades for 25 points each

sections.name: Eldar Navy
sections.description: Up to one formation for each 1500 points.

upgrades.title: Eldar Titans Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: 0-1 Bone Singer
items.description: Add one Bone Singer to the formation.
